name: Premier Inn Middlesbrough Central South

reviews.text: Very comfortable.
reviews.title: A pleasant experience.

reviews.text: Staff helpful and pleasant.
reviews.title: Top Marks Girls.

reviews.text: Breakfast was lovely and room was comfortable and roomy.
reviews.title: Coffee, hot choc & marshmallows

reviews.text: Staff were informative .I would recommend staying in this Premier Inn
reviews.title: Jill is Brill

reviews.text: and look forward to sampling others in the future.
reviews.title: Premier Inn.

reviews.text: My experience here was the polar opposite of my recent stay at the overprice Royal Bath in Bournemouth. Here I was visiting my other adult child at university and the visit was so much more enjoyable. Middlesbrough is a really friendly place and this included the service from all the staff at the premier inn. We ate at the Toby carvery next door and again the staff were so helpful and couldn't do Enough for us. We were able to buy a carafe of chilled house wine to take back to our room to relax before dinner. The meal was good value for the price we paid and the desserts super value. We didn't do breakfast as we'd eaten at the carvery and were also due to eat out later in the day. But if I stayed again I'd definitely have the breakfast as it looked super and someone else recommended it too.
reviews.title: Will be back to stsy

reviews.text: The whole atmosphere was friendly and relaxes. Ok so the room is fairly compact and bijou but super clean and lovely beds. A slight slip was that they forgot the mattress topper on my twin but I was prepared to overlook it as the staff were so friendly and kind. Looking forward to A return trip.
reviews.title: Excellent customer service

reviews.text: Our latest stay at the Premier inn Middlesbrough was very warm and welcoming. Both the reception staff were very professional, friendly and very well presented. My most impressive time though came at breakfast. The staff were lovely, they really went out of there way to help and the quality of food was exceptional.
reviews.title: Excellent service

reviews.text: After our visit to this Premier Inn our over-riding impression of the hotel was outstanding. We were greeted warmly by the receptionist and the warm welcome extended throughout our visit.
reviews.title: A few technical glitches spoilt show

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel was immaclate, bright, airy and modern, but overall we were impressed by the cleanliness.
reviews.title: comfy, safe, relaxed

reviews.text: Our visit to Middlesbrough was to help one of our sons find rental accommodation for a work placement in the area.
reviews.title: Best staff ever - firmest beds ever!!!

reviews.text: No problems finding the hotel. Check in was very warm and friendly but also professional. We had two rooms both of which were very clean, smaller than some of the premier inn rooms but everything there which you could need.
reviews.title: Best hotel experience we've had!

reviews.text: The not so great aspect was that our party of four all felt the beds were not very comfortable and we didn't have a great night's rest - beds are a little on the hard side. We did mention this on checkout to the again, very friendly and pleasant staff and were advised they have memory foam mattress toppers available on request. Tip to management might be to mention this at check in, or in pre-check in notification as this would make a huge difference to some travellers, especially the golden oldies among us!!!
reviews.title: Fatastic Hotel

reviews.text: We did have breakfast in the hotel and it was extremely good, served by staff who went over and above to look after everyone in their dining-room.
reviews.title: Comfortable and pleasant staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We will be back in Middlesborough over the course of the coming year to visit and this is highly likely to be where we will stay. However, we will make sure the mattress topper is in place next time and look forward to a better night's sleep.
reviews.title: Wirral vositor

reviews.text: Exactly what you'd expect from Premier Inn.. bland corporate and soulless. There was nothing you could say was particularly wrong, not nothing stood out as special either. I was looking specifically for a place on the south side of Middlesbrough and this was the only hotel in the right location. If there had been anything else nearby I'd have gone for that instead.
reviews.title: The Usual Soulless Experience

reviews.text: Stayed here for 2 nights for the weekend of the Great North Run. The Premier Inn is in a good location, close to other amenities and was up to the usual high standard of Premier Inns.
reviews.title: The staff really make this an exceptional place to stay

reviews.text: I have to say it is the staff who really make this Premier Inn exceptional. All were incredibly polite, friendly and professional. Nothing was too much trouble. Particular mention goes to Steph who served breakfast both days. She organised an early breakfast to accommodate our need to leave early for the GNR and on both days prepared a little pack of a drink and snack for our toddler for his car journey, not something we had requested and completely above and beyond the call if duty! We were so impressed and would stay here again without doubt.
reviews.title: paul& grace

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we enjoyed our stay at this premier inn made very welcome by jill in reception and looked after well at breakfast by steph rooms spacious comfortable and clean ,free car parking the toby caravery was ok this premier inn is recommended.
reviews.title: premier inn

reviews.text: stayed at this premier inn in middlesbrough pleasant staff usual standard of rooms good carparking is cheaper to eat breakfast at toby inn next door check price eat in premier inn breakfast was fine situated on main road but little traffic noise had room at the back with open green space to the rear no other eating venues within walking distance liked the 24 hour coffee machine a nice touch
reviews.title: Very friendly staff, welcomed me with open arms.

aka: Premier Inn Middlesbrough Central South Hotel
